entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
